alert.note: Alert for Pike (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 5:59PM EDT until September 08 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Sullivan County in central New York... North central Pike County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Highland Lake, or 13 miles northwest of Port Jervis, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lackawaxen, Shohola, Mongaup Valley, Smallwood, White Lake, Highland Lake, Eldred, Beaver Brook, Forestburgh, and Barryville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
